summary: REQ-12 appears implemented by updating the centralized contact configuration values in `frontend/src/config/contact.ts` to the specified phone display, E.164 tel value, and email address, with helper functions generating `tel:` and `mailto:` links. Two additional non-functional/state-summary files were also modified, which were not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated repository metadata/state files (`frontend-file-summaries.txt` and `project_state.json`) unrelated to changing the centralized phone/email config.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to update centralized contact details in `frontend/src/config/contact.ts` and explicitly listed non-goals around other changes; these files are not mentioned as required deliverables.
